roleset.name: say, giving of advice
roleset.note: SUGGEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'suggest' based on big corpus, comparison with 'say'; adjectival 'suggestive' found in medi-seedcorpus. (from suggest.01-v)
SUGGESTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on suggest-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls say-37.7. (from suggestion.01-n)
SUGGESTIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from suggestive.01-j)

example.name: suggest-v: one of many variations
example.text: [The newly fattened premiums reflect the increasingly global marketing of some country funds]-1, Mr. Porter suggests *trace*-1.

example.name: suggest-v: with all the args
example.text: Mary suggested to John that he shower more frequently.

example.name: suggestion-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: the senators seeking loophole suggestions from lobbyists forvarious sectors of the economy
example.arg: from lobbyists for various sectors of the economy

example.name: suggestion-n: with arg 2
example.text: to send his suggestions to the committee

example.name: suggestion-n: with GOL
example.text: The documents include : ... construction suggestions for communications installations and cable setups ;
example.arg: for communications installations and cable setups

example.name: suggestive-j
example.text: Histologic features are suggestive of a poorly differentiated invasive ductal carcinoma .
example.arg: of a poorly differentiated invasive ductal carcinoma

roleset.name: sexually suggestive
roleset.note: SUGGEST-V NOTES: Split off from original .01 roleset by Julia for unification.
SUGGESTIVE-J NOTES: Split off from original .01 roleset byJulia for unification.

example.name: suggest-v
example.text: Fashion can be abused, and instead of beauty, a dress suggests sex.

example.name: suggestive-j
example.text: She said some of Medeiros’ comments were suggestive, and alleged that on several occasions at the school, he madeinappropriate comments and gestures toward her, such as grabbingher belt, according to police reports.
